Posted By: RayB
I've got two Philadelphia A's for Sale. Oldring and Orr.
Multiple creases, some cracking, a few tiny spots of paper loss.
Cards still present incredibly well and have reasonably clean backs.
Technically grade PR-FR but display much better. Scans available on request.
Check or  Money Order preferred.
RayB

Posted By: jdrum
Most likely interested in both.  Could you send a quick scan?  Thanks.
